original_text: Jesus answered and said unto him, Because I said unto thee, I saw thee under the fig tree, believest thou? thou shalt see greater things than these.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 내가 너를 무화과나무 아래에서 보았다 하므로 믿느냐 이보다 더 큰 일을 보리라

sentences.original_text: Jesus answered and said unto him
I saw thee under the fig tree
thou shalt see greater things than these
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 이것보다 더 큰 것들을 보게 되리라
